name: Blimp Breaker
description:
Defend the skies from the onslaught of the evil Blitz Blimps as captain of a steel flinging zeppelin. Earn power ups that beef up your attack and defense while climbing higher and higher. The shadow of the Blitz Blimps has lingered long enough, it's up to you to cease their deadly bobbing!

Blimp Breaker is compatible with Goji Play and provides exclusive features for exercise when Goji Play has been enabled. For more information on Goji Play please visit www.bluegoji.com

Blimp Breaker does not support Goji Moments or Goji Mall.
